entry.summary:
Author: lushescape

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,718Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 284

Summary: ‚ÄúLike a date?‚Äù You ask in a near whisper. Jason looks like he's been electrocuted but slowly he nods his head twice. ‚ÄúYeah. A date. You and me, the school dance.‚Äù Oh. Your heart feels like it's beating so fast it's going to stop at any second. But you nod, your face warm, and there's no way you can stop yourself from smiling now. ‚ÄúUm, y- yeah.‚Äù You stammer before clearing your throat softly. ‚ÄúYes.‚Äù You say, more confident in your answer. ‚ÄúYes, I would.. love to go with you. Jason Todd wasn‚Äôt looking for company, just a roommate who wouldn‚Äôt ask questions about why he came home at two AM bloody and bruised.But in a cramped apartment in Crime Alley, between burnt coffee, leaky ceilings, and the soft hum of the city that never sleeps, the silence between you starts to change. What begins as survival becomes something quieter, steadier‚Äîsomething that almost feels like home.

entry.summary:
Author: nocteris

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,384Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 19

Summary: It was always like this, at least for Jason. He saw her every now and then when he had time to spare. For him, she was like that favorite shirt you wore when it felt just right, which made it all the more special. He kept his distance, far be it for him to disrupt the peace she‚Äôd built up for herself. The thought of her being safe and happy, brings him a sense of relief, the foreign kind in his life.
